text: No Country for Old Men is a 2007 movie made by the Coen Brothers. It won "Best Picture", "Best Director", and "Best Adapted Screenplay" at the 2007 Academy Awards. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2007 crime thriller movies Category:2000s Western (genre) movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:Miramax movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies about the illegal drug trade Category:Movies directed by the Coen brothers Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies set in the 1980s
title: No Country for Old Men (movie)
